1: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בָּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>And it came to pass at that time</n> הַהִ֔וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וַיֵּ֥רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>went down</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>that Judah</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> אֶחָ֑יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>from his brethren</n> וַיֵּ֛ט <sup>5186 </sup> <n>and turned</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>in to a certain</n> עֲדֻלָּמִ֖י <sup>5726 </sup> <n>Adullamite</n> וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>whose name</n> חִירָֽה׃ <sup>2437 </sup> <n>[was] Hirah</n>
2: וַיַּרְא־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> שָׁ֧ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יְהוּדָ֛ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>And Judah</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>there a daughter</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of a certain</n> כְּנַעֲנִ֖י <sup>3669 </sup> <n>Canaanite</n> וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>whose name</n> שׁ֑וּעַ <sup>7770 </sup> <n>[was] Shuah</n> וַיִּקָּחֶ֖הָ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and he took her</n> וַיָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and went in</n> אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n>
3: וַתַּ֖הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>And she conceived</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> בֵּ֑ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַיִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and he called</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> עֵֽר׃ <sup>6147 </sup> <n>Er</n>
4: וַתַּ֥הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>And she conceived</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>again and bare</n> בֵּ֑ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and she called</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> אוֹנָֽן׃ <sup>209 </sup> <n>Onan</n>
5: וַתֹּ֤סֶף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>And she yet again conceived</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> בֵּ֔ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> וַתִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> שֵׁלָ֑ה <sup>7956 </sup> <n>Shelah</n> וְהָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בִכְזִ֖יב <sup>3580 </sup> <n>and he was at Chezib</n> בְּלִדְתָּ֥הּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>when she bare</n> אֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>853 </sup>
6: וַיִּקַּ֧ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> יְהוּדָ֛ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>And Judah</n> אִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a wife</n> לְעֵ֣ר <sup>6147 </sup> <n>for Er</n> בְּכוֹר֑וֹ <sup>1060 </sup> <n>his firstborn</n> וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>whose name</n> תָּמָֽר׃ <sup>8559 </sup> <n>[was] Tamar</n>

10: וַיֵּ֛רַע <sup>7489 </sup> <n>was displeasing</n> בְּעֵינֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the sight</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>And the thing which</n> עָשָׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he did</n> וַיָּ֖מֶת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>wherefore he slew</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>853 </sup>

And she said</n> חֹתָֽמְךָ֙ <sup>2368 </sup> <n>Thy signet</n> וּפְתִילֶ֔ךָ <sup>6616 </sup> <n>and thy bracelets</n> וּמַטְּךָ֖ <sup>4294 </sup> <n>and thy staff</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>is in</n> בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>that [is] in thine hand</n> וַיִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And he gave</n> לָּ֛הּ וַיָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>[it] her and came in</n> אֵלֶ֖יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וַתַּ֥הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>unto her and she conceived</n> לֽוֹ׃
